Class Showtime

java.lang.Object
entities.Showtime

public class Showtime extends Object implements Serializable
Represents one Showtime in the Cinema

      public Showtime(String name, String location, int numCinemas, int cineplexID, int cinemaID, CinemaClass cinemaClass, int showtimeID)

      Parameters:
      name - Name of Cineplex
      location - Location of Cineplex
      numCinemas - Location of Cineplex
      cineplexID - ID of Cineplex
      cinemaID - Name of Cineplex
      cinemaClass - Location of Cineplex
      showtimeID - ID of Shotwime
